metadata.title: Play MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES - A Visual Novel Game by Nicky Case
metadata.description: Explore MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES, a visual novel game focusing on mental health, comedy, and narratives. Stay strong and enjoy this 4.9-rated HTML5 game.
metadata.keywords: MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES, visual novel, Nicky Case, HTML5 game, comedy, mental health, narrative

hero.p: Embark on a poignant journey into mental health awareness with the highly-rated visual novel game, MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES, crafted by Nicky Case.

gameFeatures.title: Key Features of MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES
features: Engaging Narrative: Immerse yourself in a story that blends humor with mental health themes.
Interactive Gameplay: Make choices that influence the storyline and outcomes.
Relatable Characters: Connect with characters dealing with real-world mental health issues.
Breathtaking Visuals: Experience compelling art and design that enhances the narrative.
Free & Open Source: Access the game freely on various platforms.

gameplayInstructions.title: How to Play MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES
instructions: Begin your journey by selecting choices that shape the narrative.
Use the mouse to navigate and interact with characters and objects.
Pay attention to the dialogues to make informed decisions.
Explore different story paths based on your choices.
Replay the game to discover alternate endings and narratives.

questions.question: What platforms can I play MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES on?
questions.answer: The game is available on HTML5-supported platforms.

questions.question: Is MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES free?
questions.answer: Yes, the game is free and open-source.

questions.question: Can I support the creator of the game?
questions.answer: Yes, you can support Nicky Case through Patreon, PayPal, or Ko-Fi.

questions.question: Is this game suitable for all ages?
questions.answer: The game's content is suitable for mature audiences due to its sensitive themes.

questions.question: Are there multiple endings in MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES?
questions.answer: Yes, your choices affect the storyline and can lead to different endings.

questions.question: Where can I find more mental health resources?
